overview: "The Hunt" is a feature film about a desperate father who agrees to be hunted for 7 days. Dean is a man on the edge. He struggles to provide for his wife and two sons, the youngest of which is sick in the hospital. When things seem their most desperate, a wealthy man offers the proposal of a lifetime. 1 million dollars to be hunted for 7 days. "The Hunt" is an indie film produced for just $8,000.
title: The Hunt
